          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Radiation emission from radioactive substances</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Strahlung Emission von den radioaktiven 
Substanzen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Émission de rayonnement des substances 
radioactives</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Emissão da radiação das substâncias 
radioativas</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Emissione di radiazione dalle sostanze 
radioattive</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Εκπομπή ακτινοβολίας από τις ραδιενεργές ουσίες</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Emisión de la radiación de sustancias 
radiactivas</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows different things you can do to radioactive substances to see what happens to the amount radiation it will emit.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">heating</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">radiation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">radioactive substances</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">cooling</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">dissolving</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt unterschiedliche Sachen, 
die Sie zu den radioaktiven Substanzen tun können, um zu sehen, was 
der Menge Strahlung geschieht es ausstrahlt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre différentes choses que
vous pouvez faire aux substances radioactives pour voir ce qui arrive 
au rayonnement de quantité il émettra.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra coisas que diferentes 
você pode fazer às substâncias radioativas para ver o que acontece 
à radiação de uma quantidade se emitirá.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra le cose che 
differenti potete fare alle sostanze radioattive per vedere che cosa 
accade alla radiazione di quantità emetterà.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει διαφορετικά πράγματα 
μπορείτε να κάνετε στις ραδιενεργές ουσίες για να δείτε
τι συμβαίνει στην ακτινοβολία ποσού που θα εκπέμψει.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra diversas cosas que 
usted puede hacer a las sustancias radiactivas para ver qué sucede a 
la radiación de la cantidad emitirá.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Heizung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Strahlung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">radioaktive Substanzen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Abkühlen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Auflösen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">chauffage</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">rayonnement</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">substances radioactives</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">refroidissement</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">dissolution</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">heating</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">radiação</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">substâncias radioativas</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
